quote.text: Without language, one cannot talk to people and understand them; one cannot share their hopes and aspirations, grasp their history, appreciate their poetry, or savor their songs.
quote.author: Nelson Mandela

certifications.name: Special diploma in Japanese History and Language

testimonies.desc:
Diptiさん、3日間、本当にありがとうございました。
Diptiさんが、とてもソフトな感じの方でしたので、私はくつろいだ気持ちでプレゼンや面接ができました。お疲れ様でした。
Big thank to Dipti Sensei in helping to grasp the language in a much easier way
testimonies.givenBy: Student at NILI - Japanese langauge institute

services.title: Live interpretation during interview, seminar and events
Effective lessons, perfectly adjusted to my clients' needs and wishes
Preparation for N3 and N2 certification
